text: Sold auction. $15000. In Union NJ. If you have the money to do something that dumb then great but tickets the next day are like $10...https://t.co/PiCTxD74m1~
title: Someone Just Bought Avengers: Endgame Ticket For More Than Rs 10 Lakhs & We Are Freaking Out!
description: Can money buy happiness? Only if your happiness lies in watching the first day first show of Avengers: Endgame, you would spend about 2 lakhs for a movie ticket, right? The pre-sale of tickets for Avengers: Endgame began some time ago, and broke records. Cinema websites crashed because of high demands. The movie made a record of most pre-sales tickets purchased within 24 hours.
